medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever and persistent right upper quadrant abdominal pain after ERCP.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Fever for 1 day, abdominal pain started almost immediately following the ERCP, worsened with eating. The fever at home reached 101 degrees and has been alleviated mildly with Tylenol but now has decrescendos.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of liver transplant with complications including hepatic artery stenosis, pericardial effusion, bile leak, ESBL hepatic abscess, splenic vein thrombosis, CAD s/p MI, moderate to severe mitral regurgitation, CKD III, hypertension, type II diabetes insulin dependent, psoriasis, chronic anemia, and history of alcoholic cirrhosis.
